metadata.title: Minister Rana Mubashar extends Eid-ul-Azha greetings to nation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 7 (APP): Federal Minister for Public Affairs Unit (PAU), Rana Mubashar Iqbal, extended heartfelt Eid-ul-Azha greetings to the people of Pakistan, urging unity and collective efforts to achieve national progress. In his special Eid message, the minister emphasized the spirit of love, sacrifice, and national solidarity. He prayed for the continued sovereignty and protection of Pakistan and for a future marked by harmony, prosperity, and strength. Rana Mubashar called upon all political parties to work together for the development of the country. Paying tribute to the Pakistan Army, he lauded the recent "great victory" against India, commending the armed forces for their bravery and unwavering commitment to defending the homeland. The minister reaffirmed his commitment to serving the public and working for the welfare of Pakistan. Concluding his message, he extended warm Eid wishes to the nation, saying, "Eid Mubarak to the entire nation."
